name: angular-smd
description: Simple Material Design components for Angular

scripts.build: tsc -d src/app/shared/component/smd-fab-speed-dial.ts --experimentalDecorators -t ES5 --lib dom,dom.iterable,es2016,scripthost ; mv src/app/shared/component/smd-fab-speed-dial.js index.js ; mv src/app/shared/component/smd-fab-speed-dial.d.ts index.d.ts
